contest-event.event-date:
June 18, 2016 D Eidgenössisches Musikfest (First Section)
Eidgenössisches Musikfest (First Section) 10 Set Test and Own Choice Eidgenössisches Musikfest eidgenossisches-musikfest-first-section
Switzerland
First
Sinfonietta no. 3 [Crausaz]
Montreux, VD, Switzerland > held on June 17th - 19th
Draws till 3 played on Friday, then till 19 on Saturday, finally till 27 on Sunday. Venues/Stages: Auditorium Stravinski (marked A) and Miles Davis Hall (M) - separate Rankings.
A: Jury Set Work: Sparke, Buchegger, Withington Jury Own Choice: Torstein Aagard-Nilsen, Jacob De Haan, Luc Vertommen
M: Jury Set Work: Kolly, Bach, Didier Jury Own Choice: Rolf Schumacher, Carlo Balmelli, Erik Janssen
June 16, 2013, 9:28 a.m. Sept. 23, 2016, 9:14 a.m.
1 Brass Band Kirchenmusik Flühli Armin Renggli Spiriti
1 Brass Band MG Reiden Roland Fröscher Earthrise
